short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic extension to load influencer data by detecting social sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our Chrome extension is designed to help you get the most out of your social media experience by providing valuable insights into the influencers you follow on Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube. With a single click, you can access detailed analytics on their reach, engagement, and other key metrics that are critical for making informed decisions about who to follow and partner with.

Our extension is easy to use and requires no setup or configuration. Simply install it in your Chrome browser, and the data will be displayed automatically when you visit an influencer's profile. Our extension works seamlessly with Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube, and provides a unified view of influencer analytics across all platforms.

With our powerful analytics, you'll be able to identify top performers, track engagement rates, and get a better understanding of how influencers are engaging with their audiences. This information can be incredibly valuable for marketers who are looking to partner with influencers, as well as for influencers who are looking to optimize their content and grow their following.

Our Chrome extension is perfect for anyone who wants to stay ahead of the curve in the fast-paced world of social media. Whether you're a marketer, influencer, or social media enthusiast, our extension can help you make data-driven decisions, track your progress, and unlock the full potential of your social media presence.
